# Ap Group (Data Source)

Data source for access point groups.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "unifi_ap_group" "default" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the AP group to look up.

### Optional

- `site` (String) The name of the site the AP group is associated with.

### Read-Only

- `device_macs` (List of String) List of device MAC addresses in the AP group.
- `id` (String) The ID of this AP group.
